name: Bubble Hunter (trito)
description:
This is a puzzle maze game. You start with 10 air bubbles.  Each time you move you will loose one bubble. If you step on bubbles you will get ten new bubbles. If you step on a octopus you will loose 2 bubbles.  Try to reach the chest without running out of air bubbles.

Game was coded in Lua with löve2D. Here are the source code: https://github.com/trito5/BubbleHunter
